Subject: [cpginc] Reports connected to Overtime
Description:
Hi Syaeful, as discussed over skype, some of the admin employees of cpginc are having a trouble in extracting the Overtime Request Report, there are times that they cannot also extract the Overtime Report. The issue is always on their end they cannot extract a report but when we tried on our end using our account, we can able to extract the report. According to you the root cause is connected to Data Authorization. 


Regarding Data Auth, may we know the limit or acceptable total of data authorization that we can provide to the client? Because before the client can able to extract the OT Report, OT request Report and Employee OT Report. The only issue that they encountered before is just sferr error. 


May I know if what is the reason of the optimization that is connected to the Data Auth?


Thank you.
